data.name: Kindred Spirits on the Roof Drama CD Vol.1
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


Missing the Extras?

If you purchased before April 28th or don't have the Extras in your Software library, please click this link when in your Steam Client and that should add the Extras if you're eligible.


About the Video

December. A new season and Ano’s attracting attention once again. She’s politely turned down those who have come to her directly with confessions of love, but some continue to watch her from afar, almost to the point of being stalkers.

Yuna and Nena are helping her out, but it’s starting to wear on Ano having her fans follow her all the way home. So when Hina suggests a “Fake Couple Strategy”...

Free DLC Extra Included:
- BG & Art featured in the videos
- The original CD audio
- Bonus Backgrounds
- Extra Voice Clips
(Please download these data from your library under software, after you purchase this product)

Yuna and Nena are helping her out, but it’s starting to wear on Ano having her fans follow her all the way home. So when Hina suggests a “Fake Couple Strategy”...

data.short_description: When Ano starts attracting too much attention, Hina suggests a 'Fake Couple Strategy' to fool her persistent fans into thinking she's taken.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
